UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

This is used to prevent performance issues\nin case the relay ring signature becomes too large.","type":"string","format":"uint64"},"min_stake":{"description":"Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.\n\nNOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method\nsignatures required by gogoproto.","type":"object","properties":{"amount":{"type":"string"},"denom":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}},"description":"MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
